13-ročný chlapec je obvinený z dvoch vrážd a ozbrojenej lúpeže: Ušiel po pojednávaní, napokon ho na políciu priviedla rodina
07 Nov 2019, 22:14 by Timea Krauszová

V Severnej Karolíne sa poriadne zapotili, keď im priamo „spod nosa“ ušiel mladý chlapec.

CNN informuje o prípade mladého chlapca, ktorému sa po jednom z pojednávaní podarilo ujsť priamo z budovy, v ktorej ho vypočúvali. Našli ho o niekoľko dní, už je späť vo väzbe.
Tínedžer obvinený z vraždy
Mladý Jericho W. (13) je obvivený z dvoch vrážd prvého stupňa a z ozbrojenej lúpeže. Utiecť sa mu podarilo napriek putám na nohách ráno po pojednávaní. Hľadali ho viaceré hliadky vrátane helikoptéry, napokon ho našli vďaka jeho rodine, ktorá ho presvedčila vrátiť sa späť do rúk polície. 



Podľa slov jeho príbuzných sa Jericho najskôr schoval v opustenom dome babky, neskôr našiel bicykel a prišiel k svojmu strýkovi. Fox News píšu, že sa napokon spoločne rozhodli, že chlapec sa musí vrátiť do väzby, pretože „to bolo správne.“ Pre miestnu televíznu stanicu sa strýko vyjadril, že je rád, že ho našiel skôr, ako mu mohol niekto ublížiť. Najedli sa a chlapec sa osprchoval skôr, ako sa vrátil do väzby.
Jeho útek spôsobil v meste veľký rozruch. Podľa CNN vyšetrovatelia, miestny šerif aj zástupcovia agentúry pre verejnú bezpečnosť vyjadrili obavy o bezpečnosť chlapca, ale aj o bezpečnosť verejnosti. Vraj má nepredvídateľné správanie a výbušnú povahu.
Médiá poznajú len málo detailov o jeho prípade vzhľadom na jeho vek.

ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ

A 13-year-old boy is charged with two murders and an armed robbery: He escaped after the hearing, eventually brought to the police by his family
07 Nov 2019, 22:14 by Timea Krausz

In North Carolina, they sweated badly when a young boy ran "under their nose" directly.

CNN reports on a case of a young boy who, after one hearing, managed to escape directly from the building in which he was being interviewed. They found him in a few days, he's back in custody.
Teenager charged with murder
Young Jericho W. (13) is accused of two first-degree murders and armed robbery. He managed to escape despite his handcuffs in the morning after the hearing. He was searched for by several patrols, including a helicopter, and was finally found thanks to his family, who persuaded him to return to the hands of the police.



According to his relatives, Jericho first hid in an abandoned grandmother's house, later found a bicycle and came to his uncle. Fox News writes that they finally decided together that the boy had to go back to custody because "that was right." They ate and the boy took a shower before returning to custody.
His escape caused a big stir in the city. According to CNN, the investigators, the local sheriff and representatives of the Public Safety Agency expressed concerns about the safety of the boy, but also about public safety. It is said to have unpredictable behavior and explosive nature.
The media knows little details about his case due to his age.
